dct_title_s: A geological map of a part of Massachusetts on Connecticut River, 1817
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and landforms. Includes "Transverse section of rock strata from Housack Mountain to eleven miles east of Connecticut River." Taken from: Remarks on the geology and mineralogy of a section of Massachusetts on Connecticut River, with a part of New-Hampshire and Vermont; issued in: The American Journal of Science (New York), v. 1 (1819).
